name: Yaade
description: Local MCP memory storage server for AI agents
systemMessage: You are working on Yaade, a local MCP-compatible memory storage server for AI agents. Tech stack: Python 3.12+, ChromaDB, sentence-transformers, Textual TUI, FastMCP, Pydantic v2. Key rules: 1) Local-first - no external APIs, 2) No telemetry, 3) Main thread for embeddings in TUI, 4) Use ConfigManager for .env changes. Commands: uv sync (install), uv run yaade (TUI), uv run yaade serve (MCP), uv run pytest (tests).
